casebody.data:
No. 10-879. Gloria Gail Kurns, Executrix of the Estate of George M. Corson, Deceased, et al., Petitioners v. Railroad Friction Products Corporation, et al. 563 U.S. 1032, 131 S. Ct. 2959,

180 L. Ed. 2d 244,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4271. June 6, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit granted.

Same case below, 620 F.3d 392.
